trans-unit.source: Provides a design surface, which renders a visual representation of process flow.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma superfície de desenho que compõe uma representação visual de fluxo de processo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] WorkflowView is the design surface which renders a visual representation of process flow described in workflow markup.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WorkflowView é a superfície de desenho que compõe uma representação visual de fluxo de processo descrito na marcação de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowView offers a rich set of user interface functionality needed by the activity designers for rendering and for responding to various Windows-generated events.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowView oferece um conjunto avançado de funcionalidades de interface de utilizador necessários para os estruturadores de atividades para composição e para responder a vários eventos gerados pelo Windows.

trans-unit.source: Also, the WorkflowView offers a set of common functions which can be used by all designers to perform certain activities.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o WorkflowView oferece um conjunto de funções comuns que podem ser utilizados por todos os designers para efetuar determinadas atividades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> with the specified service provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> com o fornecedor de serviço especificado.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.IServiceProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.IServiceProvider>interface.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> is a component that handles messages from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>é um componente que processa mensagens de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: Using the `Strategy` design pattern, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> will pass messages to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o `Strategy` padrão de conceção, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>passará mensagens para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>deve ser processada.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: Mouse events, keyboard events, paint and layout events are passed on to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de rato, eventos de teclado, paint e esquema de eventos são transmitidos para um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>associados <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> de coordenadas de cliente para coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client: - Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>utiliza dois espaços coordenados: lógico e o cliente:-cliente coordenadas são uma relativo para o canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area.
trans-unit.target: O canto superior esquerdo é 0,0; x e y coordenadas aumentam verticalmente e horizontalmente área visível.

trans-unit.source: The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> and by the scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: O sistema de coordenadas do cliente é afetado pelo nível de zoom do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>e a posição de deslocamento.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: - In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0.
trans-unit.target: -No sistema de coordenadas lógico todos os objetos sempre está mapeado para 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: A posição verticalmente e horizontalmente não é afetada por posição zoom ou barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se não chame o método CreateAccessibilityInstance explicitamente, este será chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>, tem de adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assemblagem instalada com o .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando é o parâmetro disposing `true`, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>referências.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Dispose` and `Finalize`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre `Dispose` e `Finalize`, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Enables the button on the design surface that, when clicked, changes the zoom level of the workflow design surface so that the entire workflow is displayed in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ativa o botão na conceção de superfície que, quando clica, as alterações o nível de zoom da estrutura de fluxo de trabalho de anexação para que todo o fluxo de trabalho é apresentado no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the dynamic button is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o botão dinâmico está ativado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <xref:System.Object> passed is visible, expanding parent objects and scrolling the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o <xref:System.Object>transmitido é visível, expandir objetos principais e deslocamento de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> conforme necessário.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Use EnsureVisible when you are working with an object in the workflow that requires user interface cues.
trans-unit.target: Utilize EnsureVisible quando estiver a trabalhar com um objeto no fluxo de trabalho que requer ajudas de interface de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: EnsureVisible will expand parent objects and scroll the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> as necessary to make the object visible on the designer.
trans-unit.target: EnsureVisible irá expandir objetos principais e desloque-se a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>conforme necessário para tornar o objeto visíveis no estruturador de.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The object to make visible.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para tornar visíveis.

trans-unit.source: selectableObject is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: selectableObjecté uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Changes the zoom level of the workflow design surface so that the entire workflow is displayed in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Altera o nível de zoom da superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho para que todo o fluxo de trabalho é apresentado no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The actual zoom level is dependent upon the settings of the user's workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: O nível de zoom real está dependente as definições do estruturador de fluxo de trabalho do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Changes the zoom level to one hundred percent to display the full size of the workflow in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Altera o nível de zoom para por cento de uma centena para apresentar o respetivo tamanho total do fluxo de trabalho no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified type, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de serviço do tipo especificado, se estiver disponível.

trans-unit.source: `GetService` returns a <xref:System.Object> implementing the requested service, or a null reference (`Nothing`) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: `GetService`Devolve um <xref:System.Object>Implementar o serviço pedido ou uma referência nula (`Nothing`) se o serviço não pode ser resolvido.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do serviço a obter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: If the serviceType is then returns a specific ; otherwise, returns a implementing the requested service, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Se o serviceType é , em seguida, devolve específico ; caso contrário, devolve um Implementar o serviço pedido ou uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic) se o serviço não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal scrollbar for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a barra de deslocamento horizontal para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> you can use to adjust the settings and visibility of the horizontal scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> pode utilizar para ajustar as definições e a visibilidade da barra de deslocamento horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_WorkflowView" name="WorkflowView" href=""></xref> finishes processing and is about to enter the idle state.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref uid="langword_csharp_WorkflowView" name="WorkflowView" href=""> </xref> conclusão do processamento e está prestes a introduzir o estado inativo.

trans-unit.source: If you have tasks to perform before the thread becomes idle, attach them to this event.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver tarefas a efetuar para que o thread de fica inativo, anexe-as a este evento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: Invalida especificada <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> e leva-o para ser repainted.

trans-unit.target: Utilizar InvalidateClientRectangle para fazer com que um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, em coordenadas do cliente, para ser adicionado à região de atualização.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, in client coordinates, to invalidate and cause to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, em coordenadas do cliente, para invalidar e fazer com que o ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> and causes it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Invalida especificada <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> e leva-o para ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: Use InvalidateLogicalRectangle to cause a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, in logical coordinates, to be added to the update region.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar InvalidateLogicalRectangle para fazer com que um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, em coordenadas lógicas, ser adicionado à região de atualização.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Restaura as informações de estado de visualização a partir de um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: LoadViewState restores view-state information previously saved by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: LoadViewState restaura as informações de estado de visualização guardadas anteriormente ao chamar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A>método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override this method when you need to customize how a custom designer restores its view-state.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método quando precisar de personalizar a forma como um designer personalizado restaura o estado de visualização.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um botão do rato é libertado através de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Eventos de rato ocorrem pela seguinte ordem: 1.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseEnter%2A> 2.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseMove%2A> 3.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseHover%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseDown%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseWheel%2A>4. OnMouseUp 5.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseLeave%2A> OnMouseUp ocorre quando o ponteiro do rato está sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>e um botão é libertado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseLeave%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseWheel%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseDown%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseHover%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseMove%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseEnter%2A>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a roda do rato se move quando o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> tem foco.

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order: 1.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseEnter%2A> 2.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseMove%2A> 3.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseHover%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseDown%2A> or OnMouseWheel 4.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseUp%2A> 5.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseLeave%2A> OnMouseWheel occurs when the mouse wheel is moved over the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de rato ocorrem pela seguinte ordem: 1.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseEnter%2A> 2.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseMove%2A> 3.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseHover%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseDown%2A>ou OnMouseWheel 4.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseUp%2A> 5.<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseLeave%2A> OnMouseWheel ocorre quando a roda do rato é movida sobre <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseLeave%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseUp%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseDown%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseHover%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseMove%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseEnter%2A>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> é redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: OnPaint occurs when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: OnPaint ocorre quando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>é redesenhado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag option should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar e permite que a origem de arrastar determinar se a opção de arrastar deverá ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The OnQueryContinueDrag event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento de OnQueryContinueDrag é gerado quando existe uma alteração no estado de botão de teclado ou rato durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: The OnQueryContinueDrag event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O evento OnQueryContinueDrag permite que a origem de arrastar determinar se a operação de arrastamento deverá ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Events related to drag operations are raised when the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Eventos relacionados com operações de arrastar são gerados quando o controlo é um destino de largar válido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag effect specified.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A>o evento é gerado com o efeito de arrastar especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de arrastar efeitos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor de rato, o estado de teclado e o estado de botão de rato são registadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o utilizador move fora de uma janela de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragEnter%2A> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o rato entra outro controlo, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragEnter%2A>para esse controlo é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o rato se move mas permanece no controlo da mesmo, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the OnQueryContinueDrag event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the `Action` property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se existir uma alteração no estado de botão de teclado ou rato, os eventos de OnQueryContinueDrag é gerado e determina se deve continuar a arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da `Action` propriedade do evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Continue`, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>evento é desencadeado para continuar a operação e a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A>o evento é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visual adequado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de remoção válido, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A>eventos estão emparelhados, para que como o rato se move em toda a lista de destino, é dada utilizador os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do rato.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Drop`, o valor do efeito de largar é devolvido para a origem de, pelo que a aplicação de origem possa efetuar a operação adequada nos dados de origem; cortar por exemplo, os dados se a operação foi uma mudança.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the OnQueryContinueDrag event sets `Action` to `DragAction.Cancel` if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to `DragAction.Drop` if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o evento OnQueryContinueDrag define `Action` para `DragAction.Cancel` se a tecla ESC foi premida e define `Action` para `DragAction.Drop` se o botão de média, esquerdo ou direito rato é premido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when a different designer is set as the new root designer of the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a outro estruturador está definido como o estruturador raiz novo da superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: Called when the zoom level is changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o nível de zoom é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Força o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> para aplicarem a lógica de esquema para todos os respectivos controlos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: PerformLayout updates all child controls in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>, resizing and moving them as necessary.
trans-unit.target: PerformLayout atualiza todos os controlos subordinados no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>, redimensionamento e movê-los conforme necessário.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cause the layout to update immediately; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para fazer com que o esquema atualizar imediatamente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the PrintDocument object to set the properties that describe how to print, and call the `Print` method to start the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o objecto de PrintDocument para definir as propriedades que descrevem como imprimir e chame o `Print` método para iniciar o processo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: A PrintDocument object that sends output to a printer.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de PrintDocument que envia dados para uma impressora.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the print preview mode of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de pré-visualização do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if print preview mode is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o modo de pré-visualização está ativo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes an associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove um associados <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to respond to designer events, such as drag events.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>para responder a eventos estruturador, tais como arraste eventos.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref> para remover o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root designer for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estruturador raiz para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The root designer of the workflow is the designer associated with the design surface of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O estruturador raiz do fluxo de trabalho é o estruturador associado a superfície de desenho do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: It contains all child designers, and subsequently all activities in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Contém todos os designers de subordinados e, subsequentemente, todas as atividades no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the root designer is changed.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o estruturador raiz é alterado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Saves the view-state to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Guarda o estado de visualização para uma transmissão em fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties and child controls of a view.
trans-unit.target: Vista de estado é a acumulação dos valores das propriedades e controlos subordinados de uma vista.

trans-unit.source: Property values are persisted to the stream after saving and can be restored using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade são mantidos na sequência depois de guardar e pode ser restaurados utilizando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A>método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to store the view state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>utilizada para armazenar o estado de visualização.</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.source: Saves an image of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> to the specified stream using the specified image format.
trans-unit.target: Guarda uma imagem de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> para o stream especificado utilizando o formato de imagem especificado.

trans-unit.source: The workflow view image is created as a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de vista do fluxo de trabalho é criada como um mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> to save the workflow view image to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream>para guardar a imagem de vista do fluxo de trabalho para.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> to use to save the workflow view image.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> a utilizar para guardar a imagem de vista do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: stream or imageFormat contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: streamou imageFormat contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Saves an image of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> to the specified file using the specified image format.
trans-unit.target: Guarda uma imagem de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> para o ficheiro especificado utilizando o formato de imagem especificado.

trans-unit.source: The workflow view image is created as a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de vista do fluxo de trabalho é criada como um mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file in which to store the workflow view image.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para o ficheiro onde pretende armazenar a imagem de vista do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> to use to save the workflow view image.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> a utilizar para guardar a imagem de vista do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: imageFile or imageFormat contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: imageFileou imageFormat contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Saves an image of the WorkflowView to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Guarda o WorkflowView uma imagem para a área de transferência.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> from screen coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> do ecrã de coordenadas para coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client: Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>utiliza dois espaços coordenados: lógico e o cliente: coordenadas de cliente são relativo para o canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area.
trans-unit.target: O canto superior esquerdo é 0,0; x e y coordenadas aumentam verticalmente e horizontalmente área visível.

trans-unit.source: The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> and by the scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: O sistema de coordenadas do cliente é afetado pelo nível de zoom do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>e a posição de deslocamento.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0.
trans-unit.target: No sistema de coordenadas lógico todos os objetos sempre está mapeado para 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: A posição verticalmente e horizontalmente não é afetada por posição zoom ou barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to convert from screen coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> converter de coordenadas de ecrã em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> converted from screen coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> converter ecrã coordenadas coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the scrollbar on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição da barra de deslocamento do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the ScrollPosition to get or adjust the location of the scrollbar in the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o ScrollPosition obter ou ajustar a localização da barra de deslocamento a superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: A point describing the location of the scrollbar in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto que descrevem a localização da barra de deslocamento em coordenadas do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ShadowDepth for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ShadowDepth para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShadowDepth to get or adjust the shadow depth of text shown on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o ShadowDepth obter ou ajustar a profundidade da sombra do texto apresentado na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The shadow depth in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A profundidade da sombra de volumes em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Shows the **InfoTip** for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o **Descrição** para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> com o texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Shows the **InfoTip** for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o **Descrição** para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>com o texto especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the **InfoTip**.
trans-unit.target: O texto a apresentar no **Descrição**.

trans-unit.source: infoTipText is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: infoTipTexté uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Shows the **InfoTip** for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> with the specified title and text.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o **Descrição** para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> com o título especificado e texto.

trans-unit.source: Shows the **InfoTip** for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> with the specified title and text.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o **Descrição** para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>com o título especificado e texto.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The title of the **InfoTip** to display.
trans-unit.target: O título do **Descrição** para apresentar.

trans-unit.source: The text of the **InfoTip** to display.
trans-unit.target: O texto a **Descrição** para apresentar.

trans-unit.source: title is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: titleé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.target: - ou - infoTipText é uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Shows a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolTip" name="ToolTip" href=""></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Mostra um <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolTip" name="ToolTip" href=""> </xref> na localização especificada.

trans-unit.source: `ToolTips` are helpful notes to the user that display useful information about an object underneath the pointer.
trans-unit.target: `ToolTips`são notas úteis para o utilizador que apresentam informações úteis sobre um objeto, por baixo do ponteiro.

trans-unit.source: Use ShowInPlaceToolTip to display a `ToolTip` with the specified text and a desired location.
trans-unit.target: Utilize ShowInPlaceToolTip para apresentar um `ToolTip` com o texto especificado e uma localização pretendida.

trans-unit.source: The text to display.
trans-unit.target: O texto a apresentar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> specifying the location on the screen to place the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolTip" name="ToolTip" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> especificando a localização no ecrã para colocar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolTip" name="ToolTip" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service of the specified type, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o serviço do tipo especificado, se estiver disponível.

trans-unit.source: If the `serviceType` is `CommandID` this method will return a specific `CommandID`.
trans-unit.target: Se o `serviceType` é `CommandID` este método irá devolver específico `CommandID`.

trans-unit.source: For any other `Type`, `GetService` will return an Object that implements the requested service, or a null reference (`Nothing`) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Para todos os outros `Type`, `GetService` irá devolver um objeto que implementa o serviço pedido ou uma referência nula (`Nothing`) se o serviço não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do serviço a obter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> implementing the requested service, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>Implementar o serviço pedido ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic) se o serviço não pode ser resolvido.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Filters out a message before it is dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Filtra uma mensagem antes de que está a emitir.

trans-unit.source: The message to be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem a ser emitida.

trans-unit.source: You cannot modify this message.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível modificar esta mensagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to filter the message and stop it from being dispatched; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the message to continue to the next filter or control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para filtrar a mensagem e pare-o de que está a ser emitida; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para permitir que a mensagem continuar para o filtro ou o controlo seguinte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current ViewPortRectangle for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o ViewPortRectangle atual para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ViewPortRectangle contains the visible area of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O ViewPortRectangle contém área visível do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that describes the area on the screen that is visible.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que descreve a área no ecrã que está visível.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the visible area for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho da área visível para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the visible area of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho da área visível <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Size" name="Size" href=""></xref> that describes the visible area of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Size" name="Size" href=""> </xref> que descreve a área visível do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical scrollbar associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a barra de deslocamento vertical associada a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use VScrollBar to get the vertical scrollbar on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>, which you can use to make user interface adjustments.
trans-unit.target: Utilize VScrollBar para obter a barra de deslocamento vertical <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>, que pode utilizar para efetuar ajustes de interface de utilizador.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> you can use to adjust the settings and visibility of the horizontal scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> pode utilizar para ajustar as definições e a visibilidade da barra de deslocamento horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the WndProc method.
trans-unit.target: Todas as mensagens são enviadas para o método WndProc.

trans-unit.source: The WndProc method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: O método WndProc corresponde exatamente a do Windows `WindowProc` função.

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o processamento de mensagens do Windows, consulte o `WindowProc` documentação de funções de referência do SDK de plataforma do Windows localizado na biblioteca da MSDN.

trans-unit.source: The Windows Message to process.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem do Windows a processar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zoom level of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o zoom ao nível do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the zoom feature to enlarge or reduce the size of the components inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar a funcionalidade de zoom para aumentar ou reduzir o tamanho dos componentes dentro <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> sets the minimum and maximum zoom levels for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>Define os níveis de zoom mínimo e máximo de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>

trans-unit.source: The zoom level of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nível de zoom do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the zoom level is less than the minimum zoom level of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> -or- if the zoom level exceeds the maximum zoom level of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se o nível de zoom é menor que o nível de zoom mínimo do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> - ou - se o nível de zoom excede o máximo do nível de zoom do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the zoom setting for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a definição de zoom para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> alterações.

trans-unit.source: The workflow view image is created as a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de vista do fluxo de trabalho é criada como um mapa de bits.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
